ticket.title: docs: note that mail() accepts arbitrary headers
ticket.original-body: The documentation makes it sound like mail() only accepts a limited set of headers in the headers hash, but it in fact accepts any arbitrary headers, and there is a test ("can pass random headers in as a hash to mail") for it in the test suite.
